name: 'Eppur Si Muove' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 5 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which one of the President's family members was shown in the teaser?
questions.explanation:
Ellie.

	The show opened with the research lab at Johns Hopkins where Ellie worked as a researcher on the Human Pappiloma Virus.

questions.text: To whom is the title of this episode referencing?
questions.explanation:
Galileo.

	While in the kitchen of the residence, the President and Ellie were having a discussion in which the president brought up Eppur Si Muove which means "Yes, it does move". The president liked having the chance to bring up Galileo.

questions.text: What did Leo say the president would ask for if he found out Ellie was being targeted in the press?
options: Enough poison to take out the press room
questions.explanation:
Nuclear launch codes.

	Leo and the others knew what the President was like when one of his family members (especially his daughters) was thrown into the press. Leo brought up the fact that the president would ask for launch codes over his morning cereal.

questions.text: Who did Toby realize gave Congresswoman Layton the NIH figures?
questions.explanation:
Will.

	Toby remembered Will being around asking a lot of questions about the NIH figures. When CJ and Rena told him that the NIH didn't have the new figures yet because they hadn't been put on the website, Toby realized it was Will. Will, however, went to the Vice President and asked him if he was the one that gave Congresswoman Layton the new NIH figures and the Vice President admitted it.

questions.text: CJ invited the Muppets to the White House.
questions.explanation:
True.

	CJ thought the best way to show the world what Abbey was doing for people at the clinic was to invite the Muppets to the White House so Abbey could give them a physical on television.

questions.text: What perfume did Leo ask CJ if she was wearing?
questions.explanation:
White Shoulders.

	When Leo and CJ were in the hallway, Leo told CJ that his piano teacher used to wear White Shoulder perfume and after CJ left he commented that she didn't wear that much of it.

questions.text: Which "Sesame Street" character did Abbey give a shot?
questions.explanation:
Elmo.

	After giving Elmo an exam, Abbey said she was going to give him an immunization. When Elmo questioned the lack of her medical license, he became nervous when the others started laughing at his question.

questions.text: When Ellie lived in the Governor's mansion, how much allowance did CJ say she was given for chores?
questions.explanation:
Five dollars.

	CJ was expressing to Toby the fact that she didn't think the President was giving millions of dollars to the research lab at Johns Hopkins because Ellie worked there.

questions.text: This is a question from the DVD deleted scene. Which member of the Senior Staff didn't like Muppets?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	On the DVD, there is a deleted scene with Leo telling Debbie that he never cared for the puppets. Debbie called this dislike of puppets by the name Puppephobia, which she said was a real phobia.

questions.text: Which character from "Sesame Street", became intertwined in jokes about CJ?
questions.explanation:
Big Bird.

	Will was the first person on the show to tell a CJ/Big Bird joke. Later, Charlie told a couple. CJ told Will that his joke wasn't the first time she had been put into a joke with Big Bird.
